original: Domellöf, Hilding Rikard, musikdirektör, pianist, pedagog, Göteborg, f. 16/9/011 i Eskilstuna av fd. tillsyn :lär. Algot D. o. Maria Svensson. G. 34 m. Brita Henriette Ljungberg. Barn: Lennart f. 35, Marianne 39. — Organist-, kantors- o. musiklär :ex. v. musikköns., stud. i pianospel f. Lennart Lundberg i Sthlm o. Emil von Sauer i Wien 29-30. Debut. s. pianist 28, har därefter haft talrika framträd., bl. a. i sv., norsk o. dansik radio samt konsertfören. i Sthlm o. Gbg, inneh. av Gbgs musikinst. Ordf. i Musikpedagog. sällsk. i Gbg.
translated: Domellöf, Hilding Rikard, music director, pianist, educator, from Gothenburg, born on September 16, 1911 in Eskilstuna to former supervisor Algot D. and Maria Svensson. Married in 1934 to Brita Henriette Ljungberg, with two children: Lennart, born in 1935, and Marianne, born in 1939. He obtained his certification as an organist, cantor, and music teacher, studied piano with Lennart Lundberg in Stockholm and Emil von Sauer in Vienna from 1929-1930. He made his debut as a pianist in 1928 and has since had numerous performances, including on Swedish, Norwegian, and Danish radio, as well as for concert associations in Stockholm and Gothenburg, and served as president of the Music Educators Association in Gothenburg.
